S.FORM: Estonia u Estonia sa i labu nu Oco, itiza i 59 00 N, 26 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 45,228 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 42,388 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 2,840 km2, hamin nu tademawan sa 1,258,545. kakalukan umah sa 22.20%, kilakilangan umah sa 52.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 25.70% Ay-sa-ni-ya a masakaputay kapulung a kanatal (Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamu: Eesti Vabariik), hamin nu pulung Ay-sa-ni-ya (Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamu: Eesti, ('eːsʲti)), u sakacacay nu Pu-lul a bayu nu kanatal, u satabakiay a tusu nu cen-se i Ta-lin . Ay-sa-ni-ya i O-cul nu sawali saamisan. kini lala' nu kanatal namakayda i ta-lu atu i teban nu Pu-lul a bayu 2222 a subal nu masakaput mapulung, paysatip nu Pu-lul a bayu, saamisan u Hung-lan , i sawali mitepal tu Cu-te-hu , nu timulan atu sawalian maliwasak mahida u La-tul-wei-ya atu Er-lul-si u misululay pabeli, u ahebal nu lala' 45,227 pin-haw-kung-li , u demiad nu ta-lu tanengay ku akuti' susuemedan . kina kanatal nu itiniay tu a tademaw u binacadan Ay-sa-ni-ya u nu Pu-lul u Hung-lanay a tademaw. kina kanatal ayda satu nu Pai-o-li-se-huy , O-cul malcabayay mapulung, O-yuan kenis , Sen-ken kenis , saamisan ta-si-yang nikapulungan a kaput , atu nu kalisiw malpadan atu sapalahed a masakapud a tademaw nu kanatal, ya nisakalis u sayadahay ku kalisiw i kitaki. (u kamu nu Hulam: :Eesti Vabariik), :Eesti,('eːsʲti) ), .) tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Tallinn . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 24 bulad 2 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung 總統) ayza sa ci Alar Karis, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihca 11 bulad 10 demiad. u cunli nu Estonia ayza sa ci Kaja Kallas, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 1 bulad 26 demiad. laylay Ay-sa-ni-ya a kakitidaan i ayaw nu laylay a tademaw hawsa nu Hung-lan-u-ke-er a tademaw . na i 1227 a mihcaan, Ay-sa-ni-ya alaw malu nu Tan-may atu nu ri-er-man a tademawayay nu Li-wu-ni-ya u mipadangay miadin tu tademaw temeceng, namahini sisa cumuden nu ciwlu . namakayni satu sa, Ay-sa-ni-ya kina pinaay tu makuwan nu Bei-o . nikahida idaw ku Tan-may , Nul-wiy , Rye-tiyan a kanatal, Pu-lan-li-taw-wan malkaputay . 18 . 18 a se-ci maalaw nu Er-lul-si-sa nu hungtiay a kanatal u Er-kul cacayay a bulad malpapacaw satu nadikudan sakunida sa tu, i sakatusa aca malpacawpacaw i kitakit tu saayayway alaen aca nu Su-lian . 1991 a mihcaan, Ay-sa-ni-ya sisa kinacacay aca malukunida. 愛沙尼亞的現代國名(Eesti) esti.在公元98年, "aestii" "Eesti" . nu ayda a ngangan nu Ay-sa-ni-ya a kanatal (Eesti) u tatangahan namakayni i Ku-si-kan-ti-na-wei-ya a tademaw, ya i tidaay mueneng i Tung-si-kan-ti-na-wei-ya a binacadan amin u esti han nu heni. i kun-yun 98 a mihcaan, Ta-si-tuo i nipisulit nida "Ri-er-man-ni-ya-zhi " sakamu sa tya cacay u caay kalecad a kamu "aestii" patinaku tu tya Ay-sa-ni-ya . Ay-sa-ni-ya a tademaw u udip tu ku micukaymasay tu "Eesti" palungangan han tu kina kanatal, kina ngangan kiayyawan hen i 19 se-ci . nipicudad Ay-sa-ni-ya u nipicudad nu heni makilim tu i 13 atu 14 a se-ci , u nipatideng sayaway a siw-taw-yun atu nu kiwkay a cacudadan. u saayaway a cudad nu kamu Ay-sa-ni-ya sapasubana' a cudad napatahkal i 1575 a mihcaan. u nu kasumamadan a dayhak sa i Ta-er-tu a dayhaku, u Ri-tiyan a hungti ci Ku-si-ta-hu-er-se A-taw-hu i 1632 a mihcaan a nipatiden. i 1919 a mihcaan, u Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamu sayaway i tayhaku pasubana tu sapicudad. 589所學校. ayda u picudad nu Ay-sa-ni-ya u sakantanay, u kanamuhan a kawaw atu milinziay . ya sapasubana' tu nipicudad palasepaden: u talaayaway a nipasubana', sakatanitik a picudad, tu nu tanengay a picudad atu talakaway a nipicudad. misaahebal a patideng tu cacudatan nu wang-lu atu nisanga' tu sapasubana' a kawaw. u Ay-sa-ni-ya a sapasubana' sikaidaw ku kul-li , se-li , kung-li , atu se-li pakumuday a kawaw. nu aydaya a Ay-sa-ni-ya idaw tu ku lima a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku siwa nu cacudadan. Cung-huw-min-kul atu Ay-sa-ni-ya u Cung-huw-min-kul atu Ay-sa-ni-ya u nu Cung-huw-min-kul atu Ay-sa-ni-ya masakaputay kapulungan a kanatal nu masacabaay a kanatal. kinatusaay a kanatal i 1937-1940 a mihca idaw ku talakaway nu mikawaway i hekal, sikasan u Su-liyen mialaw tu Ay-sa-ni-ya kyu mapulu. namakayni i 1991 a mihca makay i Su-liyen mahcacay hawsa, ayda nai' tu ku i tusu mapapadeng tu ta-si-kuwan-sin-ci u midayliay a pikawawan. sakay i Ay-sa-ni-ya sakaykawaw u Latvia i Taypak u midayliay nipadengan tu pikawawan. cen-ci masacabay a kapud 1937 a mihca sabaw tusa a bulad tusaay idaw kucacay a demiad, Ay-sa-ni-ya atu Cung-huw-min-kul patideng tu pikawawan nu masacabayay a kapud. 1940年8月6日, . 1940 a mihca waluay a bulad idaw ku enenmay a demiad zayhan u Su-lian midebung tu Ay-sa-ni-ya a mapulu'. 1991年11月8日, . 1991 a mihca sabaw cacay a bulad waluay ku demiad, Cung-huw-min-kul u mikawaway tu sakatusa a sakakaay ci Cang-Siyaw-Yan tayni mididaw a mipalita tu Ay-sa-ni-ya , atu ya pakasikalisiway a nikalcabay nu sakakaay ci Pi-Er-Fu masasulit tu sakay tini malaliyung tu sakasikalisiw a midayhiway sulit tu kalisiw tu mapapadan sakacaay kapawan. 1995年6月, . 1995 a mihca enemay a bulad, u Cung-huw-min-kul u mababaliay a pu-cang mikelid tu masakaputay tayda i Rye-se milabu tu Mun-tay-na-lun-tan , nikahida masuadih tu Ay-sa-ni-ya a cung-tung ci Mei-Li , sikahini kina mahtusaay u malaliyun tu tuud hina papaliw. waluay a bulad, Ay-sa-ni-ya sayaway a cung-tung ci La-Er u mitayliay tu kanatal a mipalitay a kiing tayni i Taywan mididaw. sacumud a cudad O-cul Se-ken kenis pabeli tu sisulitay nu idaw tu a mibungsiway tu Cung-huw-min-kul a hu-caw nu Cung-huw-min-kul -kun-min taneng i Se-ken kenis caay pacudad tu sacumud a tayni, pahanhan tu demiad atu Se-ken kenis palamel a misausi, payenem a bulad nu demiadan hamin nu sausi tanen pahanhan tu siwaay a bataan nu demiad. manamec kina tusaay a kanatal panutek makakutay tu kawaw nu tusu "Tay-ay masasuayay masakamukamu tu sakay idaw ku kalisiw", katukuh i 2017 a mihca kina lima tu mikawaw. nisakalisiw a kawaw 2015 a mihca sepaday a bulad sabaw walu a demiad, cin-ci-pu kul-ci-maw-yi papipadan tu Cung-huw-min-kul tu hekalay a maw-yi-fa-can-siy-huy "way-maw-siy-huy " mikawaway tu "2015 a mihca u sin-Pei-O u micuduhat a milacuk tu kawaw sa "atu tulu a bataan idaw ku enem nu pikawawan tayda i Er-lul-si-sen-pi-te-paw , Hung-lan , Ay-sa-ni-ya , Ri-tiyan atu Po-lan kina kanatalan milihida tu sapatiyan, kina mapulungay kanca u Taywanay tu ku nanu tayda i Pai-o a kenis u satabakiay a misaahebal tu dadanan nu sapacakaymaba. 2017年11月, . 2017 a mihca sabaw cacay a bulad, kung-ye-ci-su u tatangahan nu mikinkiway ci Li-Si-Kuwan mikelid tu manamecay i "2017 a mihca u O-cul idaw ku nisabaluhay nikinkiwan a patahekal papiadih tu tayniay atu mikilim tu mamilabu tina kawawan" tayda i Ay-sa-ni-ya millihida tu sapacakay. 2019年, . 2019 a mihca, Ay-sa-ni-ya nu Cung-huw-min-kul sakay walu a bataan idaw ku siwa tabakiay nu malkumud a mababalin, u sakay cacay a lasubu idaw ku cacay u satabakiay nu micumutay a nikalcabay tu tuud, u sakay 74 u tabakiay a patahekal nu nikalcabay. ya tuud nipatahkal katukuh i Ay-sa-ni-yaay a kalisiw idaw ku 8,249 a mang 4,399 nu kalisiw, paymihcaan maselep tu 29,366 a pasintu. mababalin malakuwid tu "nisakalisiwan" 6,836 a mang 9,159 kalisiw nu paymihcaan maselep tu 16,199 pasintu; 2018 a mihca u Ay-sa-ni-ya u Cung-huw-min-kul saka walu a bataan idaw ku enem tabakiay amababaliay a nikacabayan, sakacacay a lasubu u tabakiay a pacumud tu tuud a masacabaay, u saka pitu idaw ku satabakiay a patahkal tu tuud nu malcabayay.

Estonia o Estonia sa i labo no Oco, itiza i 59 00 N, 26 00 E. o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa izaw ko 45,228 km2, o ahebal no lala'ay sa izaw ko 42,388 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa izaw ko 2,840 km2, hamin no tademawan sa 1,258,545. kakalokan omah sa 22.20%, kilakilangan omah sa 52.10%, zomaay henay omah sa 25.70% Ay-sa-ni-ya a masakapotay kapolong a kanatal (Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamo: Eesti Vabariik), hamin no polong Ay-sa-ni-ya (Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamo: Eesti, ('eːsʲti)), o sakacacay no Po-lol a bayo no kanatal, o satabakiay a toso no cen-se i Ta-lin . Ay-sa-ni-ya i O-col no sawali saamisan. kini lala' no kanatal namakayda i ta-lo ato i teban no Po-lol a bayo 2222 a sobal no masakapot mapolong, paysatip no Po-lol a bayo, saamisan o Hong-lan , i sawali mitepal to Co-te-ho , no timolan ato sawalian maliwasak mahida o La-tol-wei-ya ato Er-lol-si o misololay pabeli, o ahebal no lala' 45,227 pin-haw-kong-li , o demiad no ta-lo tanengay ko akoti' sosoemedan . kina kanatal no itiniay to a tademaw o binacadan Ay-sa-ni-ya o no Po-lol o Hong-lanay a tademaw. kina kanatal ayda sato no Pai-o-li-se-hoy , O-col malcabayay mapolong, O-yoan kenis , Sen-ken kenis , saamisan ta-si-yang nikapolongan a kapot , ato no kalisiw malpadan ato sapalahed a masakapod a tademaw no kanatal, ya nisakalis o sayadahay ko kalisiw i kitaki. (o kamo no Holam: :Eesti Vabariik), :Eesti,('eːsʲti) ), .) tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Tallinn . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 24 bolad 2 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (cong-tong 總統) ayza sa ci Alar Karis, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihca 11 bolad 10 demiad. o conli no Estonia ayza sa ci Kaja Kallas, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 1 bolad 26 demiad. laylay Ay-sa-ni-ya a kakitidaan i ayaw no laylay a tademaw hawsa no Hong-lan-o-ke-er a tademaw . na i 1227 a mihcaan, Ay-sa-ni-ya alaw malo no Tan-may ato no ri-er-man a tademawayay no Li-wo-ni-ya o mipadangay miadin to tademaw temeceng, namahini sisa comoden no ciwlo . namakayni sato sa, Ay-sa-ni-ya kina pinaay to makowan no Bei-o . nikahida idaw ko Tan-may , Nol-wiy , Rye-tiyan a kanatal, Po-lan-li-taw-wan malkapotay . 18 . 18 a se-ci maalaw no Er-lol-si-sa no hongtiay a kanatal o Er-kol cacayay a bolad malpapacaw sato nadikodan sakonida sa to, i sakatosa aca malpacawpacaw i kitakit to saayayway alaen aca no So-lian . 1991 a mihcaan, Ay-sa-ni-ya sisa kinacacay aca malokonida. 愛沙尼亞的現代國名(Eesti) esti.在公元98年, "aestii" "Eesti" . no ayda a ngangan no Ay-sa-ni-ya a kanatal (Eesti) o tatangahan namakayni i Ko-si-kan-ti-na-wei-ya a tademaw, ya i tidaay moeneng i Tong-si-kan-ti-na-wei-ya a binacadan amin o esti han no heni. i kon-yon 98 a mihcaan, Ta-si-too i nipisolit nida "Ri-er-man-ni-ya-zhi " sakamo sa tya cacay o caay kalecad a kamo "aestii" patinako to tya Ay-sa-ni-ya . Ay-sa-ni-ya a tademaw o odip to ko micokaymasay to "Eesti" palongangan han to kina kanatal, kina ngangan kiayyawan hen i 19 se-ci . nipicodad Ay-sa-ni-ya o nipicodad no heni makilim to i 13 ato 14 a se-ci , o nipatideng sayaway a siw-taw-yon ato no kiwkay a cacodadan. o saayaway a codad no kamo Ay-sa-ni-ya sapasobana' a codad napatahkal i 1575 a mihcaan. o no kasomamadan a dayhak sa i Ta-er-to a dayhako, o Ri-tiyan a hongti ci Ko-si-ta-ho-er-se A-taw-ho i 1632 a mihcaan a nipatiden. i 1919 a mihcaan, o Ay-sa-ni-ya a kamo sayaway i tayhako pasobana to sapicodad. 589所學校. ayda o picodad no Ay-sa-ni-ya o sakantanay, o kanamohan a kawaw ato milinziay . ya sapasobana' to nipicodad palasepaden: o talaayaway a nipasobana', sakatanitik a picodad, to no tanengay a picodad ato talakaway a nipicodad. misaahebal a patideng to cacodatan no wang-lo ato nisanga' to sapasobana' a kawaw. o Ay-sa-ni-ya a sapasobana' sikaidaw ko kol-li , se-li , kong-li , ato se-li pakomoday a kawaw. no aydaya a Ay-sa-ni-ya idaw to ko lima a lasobo walo a bataan idaw ko siwa no cacodadan. Cong-how-min-kol ato Ay-sa-ni-ya o Cong-how-min-kol ato Ay-sa-ni-ya o no Cong-how-min-kol ato Ay-sa-ni-ya masakapotay kapolongan a kanatal no masacabaay a kanatal. kinatosaay a kanatal i 1937-1940 a mihca idaw ko talakaway no mikawaway i hekal, sikasan o So-liyen mialaw to Ay-sa-ni-ya kyo mapolo. namakayni i 1991 a mihca makay i So-liyen mahcacay hawsa, ayda nai' to ko i toso mapapadeng to ta-si-kowan-sin-ci o midayliay a pikawawan. sakay i Ay-sa-ni-ya sakaykawaw o Latvia i Taypak o midayliay nipadengan to pikawawan. cen-ci masacabay a kapod 1937 a mihca sabaw tosa a bolad tosaay idaw kocacay a demiad, Ay-sa-ni-ya ato Cong-how-min-kol patideng to pikawawan no masacabayay a kapod. 1940年8月6日, . 1940 a mihca waloay a bolad idaw ko enenmay a demiad zayhan o So-lian midebong to Ay-sa-ni-ya a mapolo'. 1991年11月8日, . 1991 a mihca sabaw cacay a bolad waloay ko demiad, Cong-how-min-kol o mikawaway to sakatosa a sakakaay ci Cang-Siyaw-Yan tayni mididaw a mipalita to Ay-sa-ni-ya , ato ya pakasikalisiway a nikalcabay no sakakaay ci Pi-Er-Fo masasolit to sakay tini malaliyong to sakasikalisiw a midayhiway solit to kalisiw to mapapadan sakacaay kapawan. 1995年6月, . 1995 a mihca enemay a bolad, o Cong-how-min-kol o mababaliay a po-cang mikelid to masakapotay tayda i Rye-se milabo to Mon-tay-na-lon-tan , nikahida masoadih to Ay-sa-ni-ya a cong-tong ci Mei-Li , sikahini kina mahtosaay o malaliyon to tood hina papaliw. waloay a bolad, Ay-sa-ni-ya sayaway a cong-tong ci La-Er o mitayliay to kanatal a mipalitay a kiing tayni i Taywan mididaw. sacomod a codad O-col Se-ken kenis pabeli to sisolitay no idaw to a mibongsiway to Cong-how-min-kol a ho-caw no Cong-how-min-kol -kon-min taneng i Se-ken kenis caay pacodad to sacomod a tayni, pahanhan to demiad ato Se-ken kenis palamel a misaosi, payenem a bolad no demiadan hamin no saosi tanen pahanhan to siwaay a bataan no demiad. manamec kina tosaay a kanatal panotek makakotay to kawaw no toso "Tay-ay masasoayay masakamokamo to sakay idaw ko kalisiw", katokoh i 2017 a mihca kina lima to mikawaw. nisakalisiw a kawaw 2015 a mihca sepaday a bolad sabaw walo a demiad, cin-ci-po kol-ci-maw-yi papipadan to Cong-how-min-kol to hekalay a maw-yi-fa-can-siy-hoy "way-maw-siy-hoy " mikawaway to "2015 a mihca o sin-Pei-O o micodohat a milacok to kawaw sa "ato tolo a bataan idaw ko enem no pikawawan tayda i Er-lol-si-sen-pi-te-paw , Hong-lan , Ay-sa-ni-ya , Ri-tiyan ato Po-lan kina kanatalan milihida to sapatiyan, kina mapolongay kanca o Taywanay to ko nano tayda i Pai-o a kenis o satabakiay a misaahebal to dadanan no sapacakaymaba. 2017年11月, . 2017 a mihca sabaw cacay a bolad, kong-ye-ci-so o tatangahan no mikinkiway ci Li-Si-Kowan mikelid to manamecay i "2017 a mihca o O-col idaw ko nisabalohay nikinkiwan a patahekal papiadih to tayniay ato mikilim to mamilabo tina kawawan" tayda i Ay-sa-ni-ya millihida to sapacakay. 2019年, . 2019 a mihca, Ay-sa-ni-ya no Cong-how-min-kol sakay walo a bataan idaw ko siwa tabakiay no malkomod a mababalin, o sakay cacay a lasobo idaw ko cacay o satabakiay no micomotay a nikalcabay to tood, o sakay 74 o tabakiay a patahekal no nikalcabay. ya tood nipatahkal katokoh i Ay-sa-ni-yaay a kalisiw idaw ko 8,249 a mang 4,399 no kalisiw, paymihcaan maselep to 29,366 a pasinto. mababalin malakowid to "nisakalisiwan" 6,836 a mang 9,159 kalisiw no paymihcaan maselep to 16,199 pasinto; 2018 a mihca o Ay-sa-ni-ya o Cong-how-min-kol saka walo a bataan idaw ko enem tabakiay amababaliay a nikacabayan, sakacacay a lasobo o tabakiay a pacomod to tood a masacabaay, o saka pito idaw ko satabakiay a patahkal to tood no malcabayay.
